entry.title: About use API to create partial billing document based on delivery quantity
entry.content:
In the public cloud, app: create billing document. There is a billing settings: choose delivery items to be billed and select quantities. So when I click the billing document to be billed, i could input the amount of quantity to be billed.

My question is if I use API to create billing documents, is the API also support this?  How to fulfill?

If not supported, is this product limit currently?

Many thanks,

Chen

entry.title: Change Field Type of field AENNR (Change Number) from alphanumeric (ABC) to string (123)?
entry.content:
The field AENNR (= Change Number) is alphanumeric in SAP S/4HANA public cloud (=CHAR in SAP).

Is it possible to change the field type from alphanumeric  (=CHAR in SAP) (like ABC) to string (like 123)?

Best regards,

Kerisha

entry.title: How to Mass maintain long texts in SAP S4 HANA Public cloud ?. Any API available?
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Do we have any API or solution available on SAP S4 HANA public cloud to mass update the long texts using text ids etc?

Our requirement is to update Memo /Notes on the real estate contracts in S4 HANA public cloud through a mass upload program.

Looking for possible solutions on this , Thanks in advance.

entry.title: How deactivate the check (chronological) of Posting date
entry.content:
Is it possbile to deactivate the check of Posting date(country Italy)?

The error message is FI_IT_DNC004

 A client need to record supplier invoices with non-chronological dates.

entry.title: How to change the posting date of schedule supplier invoice job ERS?
entry.content:
Dear Community,

When we schedule supplier invoice job for ERS, the posting date is always the job running date, is there any settings to change this posting date?

Background; At the beginning of Sep., we found missing posting for some goods receipt, we posted the goods receipt, and change the posting date to Aug., and want to post the invoice in Aug. as well, to align the goods receipt and invoice postings in the same period.

Seems we cannot use "create supplier invoice" to manually create such kind of invoice, because in the PO and supplier master data, it has already set as ERS related.

Is there any solution for changing the posting date of invoice? 

Thank you.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: Purchase Request Decision Note CDS requirement
entry.content:
There is a CDS requirement that allows us to read the value written in the decision note field that appears after the rejection of purchase requests.

As CDS, we can display the values I_WorkflowTaskResult and I_WorkflowTaskResultComment, but these also appear to be disabled.

We kindly request your suggestions and support.

entry.title: quotation error : Unpermitted combination of business object BUS2032 and sales doc. category B
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am facing an issue during the data load of quotations in the Migration Cockpit in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud.

I get the following error message:
“Unpermitted combination of business object BUS2032 and sales document category B.”

 

I checked an SAP Note which suggests using LTMOM to configure the migration object. However, this object is not editable – I can modify or add fields, but the object itself cannot be changed.

Has anyone faced a similar issue or found a solution? Any guidance would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance,
Mohammed

entry.title: How to Link Custom CDS Data to a Standalone Form in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hello everyone:

I am currently working on setting up a standalone form in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud.

This is my case:

I have created a form and linked it to the data source FDP_PP_MOR_DATA_LIST_SRV, as this form is intended to print production labels that are triggered when production is confirmed from the MES system.

I have also created a custom CDS view that combines standard fields and custom Z fields found within the MES system.

My main challenge is figuring out how to connect this CDS data to the form.

I have been exploring the Custom Fields and Logic application, but I am not sure what the correct approach is:

Custom Fields → Custom Fields

Should I implement a BAdI to expose my custom CDS fields here?

If so, could someone guide me through the steps to do this?

Custom fields → Data source extensions

How can I include my Z fields in this case?

Some specific questions:

  • Can I directly include the CDS view in either of these options?
  • Should I use both approaches (custom fields and data source extensions) together, or is there a better way?
  • Is there another recommended method to achieve this in SAP Public Cloud?

Any guidance, examples, or links to documentation would be greatly appreciated!

Thank you in advance for your help.

#SAP Forms service by Adobe   SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition   SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Manufacturing

entry.title: Extensibility Custom Field - Professional services - Project billing - PDR to BDR
entry.content:
I have a requirement to Create a custom field in (Professional services -> Project billing cycle ) using Manage Project billing App, the Target is to transfer Data from Project Billing Request ( PDR ) to Billing Document Request ( BDR ) and I have added the fields successfully into project billing and billing request Documents, but the data is not transferred from PDR to BDR

I have followed this blog:  influence-resource-related-billing-through-extensibility-from-journal-entry 

I have created a custom field in the Accounting Coding Block to be visible in the manage project billing App and enabled business scenario Coding Block to Billing Document Item for Project Billing

  1. Three more fields got Created for the following business context
    1. Entries for Project Billing Element (PROJECT_BILLING_ELEMENT_ENTRY) :
      • enabled business scenario -> Coding Block to Billing Document Item for Project Billing 
    2. Items for Project Billing Request (PROJECT_BILLING_REQUEST_ITEM):
      • enabled business scenario -> Coding Block to Billing Document Item for Project Billing 
    3. Sales: Billing Document Item (SD_BILLINGDOCITEM) :
      • enabled SAP GUI User interface so that the value be visible on billing request UI

I filled the custom field value in the manage project billing accounting document entry item level and the data is saved in PDR successfully but not transferred to BDR

entry.title: Clarification on Extensibility of Invoice List Output with Billing Document Item Details
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We are working with the Invoice List form and would like to check if there is any extensibility option available to include Billing Document Item details in the Form output.

Currently, the standard Invoice List data source does not provide these details. Before proceeding with a custom solution, we want to confirm if there is any delivered extensibility framework, CDS extension, or form adaptation option that allows us to enhance the Invoice List form with the required Billing Document Item data.

Could you please confirm if such extensibility is available in the standard system?

For your reference i have attached the expected Billing document item details PDF for your quick reference.

entry.title: Field InventoryStockType cannot be set for this operation on item level
entry.content:
Hello SAP 

I am having a trouble posting a GR that has QI Items

Payload 

"to_MaterialDocumentItem": [
{
"MaterialDocumentLine": "1",
"YY1_StickerNumber_MMI": "55528-[]",
"ManufactureDate": "/Date(1758326400000)/",
"EntryUnit": "PAC",
"Material": "000000000000001594",
"GoodsMovementRefDocType": "F",
"YY1_Chilled_Exp_Date_MMI": "/Date(1758931200000)/",
"Plant": "02BP",
"Batch": "5259002",
"YY1_Frozen_Exp_Date_MMI": "/Date(0)/",
"InventoryStockType": "02",  -> Quality inspection code
"QuantityInEntryUnit": "4",
"YY1_Ambient_Exp_Date_MMI": "/Date(1758412800000)/",
"GoodsMovementType": "101",
"StorageLocation": "",
"ManufacturingOrder": "1000054"
}

entry.title: How to register work procedures for the next fiscal year in advance in preparation for standard cost
entry.content:
1）It is possible to enter the planned cost in the item master and update the standard price, but could you please show us an example of how to update the work procedure (routing) in actual operation?
2）How to register work procedures for the next fiscal year in advance in preparation for standard cost revisions？(Setting the validity end date, assigning a change number, etc.)Whether to update in bulk?And Other points to be careful of？
Thank you！

Phani Deepthi A

entry.title: Not able to update Issuing Storage Location - RESLO - field during PR Creation using BO interface
entry.content:
Hello experts,

We’ve built a custom app on SAP Public Cloud using the RAP framework and the Business Object interface I_PURCHASEREQUISITIONTP.

The app enables the creation of stock transfer purchase requisitions between logical storage locations within the same plant, using item category "U".

However, we need to populate the field "Issuing Storage Location – RESLO", which currently does not appear to be available in the Business Object interface, nor accessible via any custom logic options we’ve explored.

Does anyone have experience or suggestions to help us manage this situation?

Thanks

Caterina

entry.title: S4HC 銷售訂單簽核mail通知
entry.content:
Hi All

請問S4HC中是否支援銷售訂單簽核時，需先mail通知簽核者，以及簽核完畢的結果再mail通知申請者?

目前確認S4HC中都有銷售訂單簽核電子郵件通知的範本，但於輸出參數設定時沒有辦法選擇到銷售訂單所以卡住了，

想請問是否有遇過這個情境的老師能指導一下，

謝謝。

entry.title: SAP S4 HANA Public Cloud ODATA V4 API throwing 403 error blocked by UCON
entry.content:
We are facing an issue with one ODAT V4  UI type service in S4 HANA public cloud system. Use case is: We have Developed a custom ODATA V4 UI service and created a Fiori elements based UI app in BAS and deployed on BTP Workzone. We have tested this app in Dev system and everything working as expected. But when we transported the same custom service and UI app to Quality system, the ODATA V4 service is throwing 403 Forbidden UCON Blocked error when we try to load the App or load the metadata from browser as well. 

 

Anyone has worked on ODATA V4 UI  API and created a UI app using BTP BAS? Your inputs are highly appreciated. Thanks.

SAP Fiori for SAP S/4HANA
